sama kabinat pa්rakashaka amathya rajitha senarathna ikuthda pawathi madhya hamuwakadi kiya sitiye parlimenthu manthi්rawaruntada wasara 5 kata warak wahana balapatha්ra labadimata thiranaya kara athi bawayi.kesewethath sirikotha paksha mulasthanaye pawathi madhya hamuwakata ekwemin eksath jathika paksha mahalekam amathya kabir hashim pawasuwe manthi්rawarunta wahana balapatha්ra labadima sambandhayen methek sthira thiranayak gena nomathi bawayi.wahana balapatha්ra sambandhayen dadi kathabahak mathuwune ema sahanaya ikuth ayawayen iwath kirimata thiranaya kirimath samagayi.

ee anuwa waidyawarun athulu saukhya karya mandala ema pradeshawalata yawimata hakiyawa uda wuna. 2009 wasare di thrasthawadaya thuran kirimen pasu ratatama galapena paridi wadapiliwelak diyath kala. 2014 warshayawana wita maleriya rogaya sampurnayenma thuran kirime aramuna athiwayi lak rajaya katayuthu kale. 2014 wana wita kisidu maleriya rogiyek lankawen wartha wuye naha.

samulu pawathwa, prathipala athpath kara ganimatath sanwadaya thulin deparshawayatama gaurawaniya wisandum marga walata awathirna wimatath chinaye sahaya himi wana bawa janadhipathi shi jinping prakasha kaleya.

hamadetama nithi panawimen ratak palanaya kala nohaki namuth gotage kalaye parisara polisiya dada gahana nisa ho minissu thamange kunu parata dana eka awama karala thibba.mama galkisse inne.ape pathi wala thamange kunu wala danna kunuwalawal kapanna idak naha.kunu andinne nagara sabhawen.namuth pasugiya dawas kihipaye kumana ho hethuwak nisa kunu ragena yannan paminiye naha.eken wune dawas ganak gewal athule narak wunu kunu minissu parata genath dana ekayi.dan nam onna aayemath nagara sabhawen kunu tika ganata aran yanawa.
